original_text:
Legends of the Colosseum Megaways
Gladiatori, tigri selvagge e cavalli sono l’anima di Legends of the Colosseum Megaways, la nuova slot targata Synot Games che offre 86.436 modi per vincere!
Un tuffo nella storia
Uno dei simboli più iconici dell’antica Roma è senza dubbio il Colosseo, il mastodontico anfiteatro costruito per ospitare eventi a cui partecipavano nobili e popolo. Gli spettacoli erano caratterizzati soprattutto da lotte tra gladiatori e tra gladiatori e animali feroci, come tigri e leoni, ma spesso venivano riprodotte epiche battaglie o racconti mitologici.
Con Legends of the Colosseum Megaways entriamo appieno nell’atmosfera dei grandi giochi e lo facciamo attraverso una grafica mozzafiato che cambia in base al tipo di gioco. In quello base ci troviamo all’esterno dell’anfiteatro, durante i Free Spins ci sposteremo invece nell’arena. Nella parte sottostante dello schermo ci sono tutti i tasti per settare al meglio la nostra giocata, in alto a sinistra troviamo invece il contatore Megaways che ci indica in ogni momento le nostre possibilità di vittoria. C’è poi un pulsante che ci permette di comprare giri gratis.
Caratteristiche di Legends of the Colosseum Megaways
Come già detto in precedenza, la slot fa parte del circuito Megaways, ciò vuol dire che i modi per vincere cambiano in base al numero variabile di simboli accolti dalle sei bobine. Si va da un minimo di 2 a un massimo di 6. La puntata minima è 0,10 € e la vincita massima è di 10.000 volte la puntata. Si vince associando almeno 3 simboli su una linea di pagamento, anche se per il gladiatori ne bastano 2. Il sistema di gioco è a cascata, ciò vuol dire che ogni volta che si forma una combo pagante, i simboli vincenti vengono rimossi e sostituiti da altri del tutto nuovi.
Sopra la griglia c’è poi un rullo orizzontale che scorre e che contribuisce a formare serie vincenti.
Tra le funzioni c’è l’Autoplay e il Gamble, che permette di raddoppiare o di perdere la somma vinta.
Il ritorno teorico al giocatore è del 96%.
Come giocare a Legends of the Colosseum Megaways
In questa slot troviamo simboli di basso livelli rappresentati dai reali dal 9 all’asso, e simboli tematici come il cavallo, la tigre, la donna e il gladiatore. Le spade incrociate sono il nostro Wild, e sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter e la moneta d’oro. Inoltre, se compare 6 volte, paga 50x la puntata. Il punto interrogativo è il simbolo misterioso che casualmente verrà trasformato in un altro simbolo.
Il Colosseo è lo Scatter, se ne atterrano quattro ci verranno assegnati dei Free Spins. Prima però vedremo apparire tre ruote divise in settori. La prima per il numero di giri gratuiti, minimo 4, massimo 14; la seconda per il moltiplicatore, compreso tra x2 e x25; la terza ruota invece indica il livello di gioco.
Durante i Free Spins nel rullo orizzontale possono comparire delle monete d’oro. Ne servono 3 per aggiornare il livello di 1 e assegnare altri 2 Free Spins.
[faq group=”Legends of the Colosseum Megaways” open=”true” title=”Domande Frequenti”

raw_translation.response:
Legends of the Colosseum Megaways
Gladiators, wild tigers, and horses are the soul of Legends of the Colosseum Megaways, the new slot game from Synot Games that offers 86,436 ways to win!
A dive into history
One of the most iconic symbols of ancient Rome is undoubtedly the Colosseum, the gigantic amphitheater built to host events attended by nobles and the common people. The shows were characterized primarily by fights between gladiators and between gladiators and ferocious animals, such as tigers and lions, but often epic battles or mythological stories were reproduced.
With Legends of the Colosseum Megaways, we fully enter the atmosphere of the great games and we do so through breathtaking graphics that change depending on the type of game. In the base game, we find ourselves outside the amphitheater, but during the Free Spins we will move to the arena. In the lower part of the screen, there are all the buttons to set our gameplay to the best, whereas in the top left corner, we find the Megaways counter that indicates at any time our chances of winning. There is also a button that allows us to buy free spins.
Features of Legends of the Colosseum Megaways
As previously stated, the slot is part of the Megaways circuit, which means that the ways to win change based on the variable number of symbols collected by the six reels. It ranges from a minimum of 2 to a maximum of 6. The minimum bet is €0.10 and the maximum win is 10,000 times the bet. You win by combining at least 3 symbols on a payline, although for the gladiator's symbol, 2 are sufficient. The game system is cascade, which means that every time a winning combo is formed, the winning symbols are removed and replaced by brand new ones.
Above the grid, there is also a horizontal roller that scrolls and contributes to forming winning combinations.
Among the functions, there is Autoplay and Gamble, which allows us to double or lose the amount won.
The theoretical return to the player is 96%.
How to play Legends of the Colosseum Megaways
In this slot, we find low-level symbols represented by the royal cards from 9 to ace, and thematic symbols such as the horse, the tiger, the woman, and the gladiator. The crossed swords are our Wild, and replace all symbols except the Scatter and the gold coin. In addition, if it appears 6 times, it pays 50x the bet. The question mark is the mysterious symbol that will be randomly transformed into another symbol.
The Colosseum is the Scatter, and if four land, we will be awarded Free Spins. However, we will first see three wheels appear divided into sectors. The first one for the number of free spins, from a minimum of 4 to a maximum of 14; the second for the multiplier, ranging from x2 to x25; the third wheel instead indicates the level of the game.
During the Free Spins, gold coins may appear on the horizontal roller. We need 3 to upgrade the level by 1 and award another 2 Free Spins.
[faq group="Legends of the Colosseum Megaways" open="true" title="Frequently Asked Questions"]

All in all, Legends of the Colosseum Megaways is an exciting game that offers players an immersive and historically accurate experience. Just make sure to wear a helmet, because those big wins can come at you fast and furious!

Review:
 
Game features and mechanics

Legends of the Colosseum Megaways is a six-reel slot game that offers 86,436 ways to win. The slot is part of the Megaways circuit, which means that the ways to win change based on the variable number of symbols collected. It ranges from a minimum of 2 up to a maximum of 6. The game system is cascade, which means that every time a paying combination is formed, the winning symbols are removed and replaced by completely new ones. Above the grid, there is a horizontal roller that scrolls and contributes to forming winning series. Among the features, there are Autoplay and Gamble, which allows you to double or lose the amount won. The theoretical return to the player is 96%.

Visuals and atmosphere

Legends of the Colosseum Megaways fully captures the atmosphere of ancient Rome through stunning graphics that change depending on the type of game. In the base game, players find themselves outside the amphitheater, while during Free Spins, they get to move to the arena. The lower part of the screen features all the buttons to set the game best, while the upper left corner shows the Megaways counter that displays winning possibilities. There is also a button that allows players to buy free spins.

Symbol themes and values

In Legends of the Colosseum Megaways, players will encounter thematic symbols such as the horse, the tiger, the woman, and the gladiator. Crossed swords are the Wild symbol, and substitute for all symbols except the Scatter and the gold coin. Also, if it appears 6 times, it pays 50x the bet. The question mark is the mystery symbol that will randomly be transformed into another symbol. In addition, low-level symbols are represented by the royals from 9 to Ace.

Winning opportunities and RTP

Players can win by matching at least 3 symbols on a payline, although for gladiators, 2 are enough. The maximum win is 10,000 times the bet, and the theoretical return to the player is 96%.

Bonus features and free spins

The Colosseum is the Scatter, and if four of them land, players will be assigned Free Spins. Three wheels will spin, with the first indicating the number of free spins (at least 4, up to 14), the second for the multiplier (ranging from x2 to x25), and the third for the level of the game. During Free Spins, gold coins may appear on the horizontal roller. Three of them are required to upgrade the level 1 and assign another 2 Free Spins.

It ranges from a minimum of 2 up to a maximum of 6. The minimum bet is €0.10 and the maximum win is 10,000 times the bet. You win by matching at least 3 symbols on a payline, although for gladiators, 2 are enough. The game system is cascade, which means that every time a paying combination is formed, the winning symbols are removed and replaced by completely new ones.

Above the grid, there is a horizontal roller that scrolls and contributes to forming winning series.

Among the features, there are Autoplay and Gamble, which allows you to double or lose the amount won.

The theoretical return to the player is 96%.

How to play Legends of the Colosseum Megaways

In this slot, we find low-level symbols represented by the royals from 9 to Ace, and thematic symbols such as the horse, the tiger, the woman, and the gladiator. Crossed swords are our Wild, and substitute for all symbols except the Scatter and the gold coin. Also, if it appears 6 times, it pays 50x the bet. The question mark is the mystery symbol that will randomly be transformed into another symbol.

The Colosseum is the Scatter, if four of them land, we will be assigned Free Spins. But first, we will see three wheels divided into sectors. The first for the number of free spins, at least 4, up to 14; the second for the multiplier, ranging from x2 to x25; the third wheel indicates the level of the game.

During Free Spins, gold coins may appear on the horizontal roller. Three of them are required to upgrade the level 1 and assign another 2 Free Spins.

A: The Scatter in Legends of the Colosseum Megaways is the Colosseum.
